definitions.definition: The small hammer -shaped bone of the middle ear .
examples: A fracture of the malleus handle is a rare traumatic middle ear lesion.

definitions.definition: The tripus ( ossicle in cypriniform fishes ) .
One of the paired calcareous structures within the mastax of rotifers .

main_definition: ( anatomy ) The small hammer -shaped bone of the middle ear .
secondary_definitions: ( ichthyology ) The tripus ( ossicle in cypriniform fishes ) .
( zoology ) One of the paired calcareous structures within the mastax of rotifers .
